Grammar:	Map 5.1
Namespace:	shr.test
Target:		TEST

A maps to B:
	_Concept maps to testW
	_Entry maps to testX
	_Value maps to testY
	C._Value maps to testZ

// Test backwards compatibility, Entry/Value should get converted to _Entry/_Value
A2 maps to B2:
	_Concept maps to testW
	Entry maps to testX
	Value maps to testY
	C.Value maps to testZ
